summary: The "Break Up Suspicious Transactions of Fentanyl Act" (BUST FENTANYL Act) addresses the fentanyl crisis. The bill modifies the International Narcotics Control Strategy Report, requiring earlier submission and a focus on precursor chemicals. It mandates a report to Congress on efforts to combat fentanyl trafficking, particularly from China, including financial system involvement and potential sanctions. It prioritizes the identification of Chinese nationals involved in fentanyl shipment and expands sanctions under the Fentanyl Sanctions Act to include entities and officials materially contributing to opioid trafficking. The bill also calls for reports on methamphetamine smuggling from Mexico.
